channel.title: Shallow Hal on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Shallow Hal on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Rene Kirby, ‘Shallow Hal’ Actor, Dies At 70
item.description: Rene Kirby, an actor known for his work in “Shallow Hal” died on July 11 in Burlington, Vermont. He was 70. His brother Jon confirmed to Seven Days that Kirby had died at the University of Vermont Med
